trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> classes along with the semantics for forward-chaining execution of those rules.
trans-unit.target: 包含集合<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>類別，以及這些規則的向前鏈結執行語意。

trans-unit.source: A RuleSet can be executed directly in code or using the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.PolicyActivity"></xref> activity.
trans-unit.target: 規則集可直接在程式碼或使用執行<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.PolicyActivity"></xref>活動。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref> class by using the name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref>類別所使用的名稱<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref>.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref> class by using the name and description of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref>類別所使用的名稱和描述<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref>.
A description of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref>.
Gets or sets the forward chaining behavior for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> classes in the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定向前鏈結行為<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>中的類別<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleChainingBehavior"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> classes in the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleChainingBehavior"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> classes in the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a deep copy of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref> that is identical to this instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"> </xref>與這個執行個體完全相同。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a description of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref>.
A description of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref>.
Determines whether two object instances are equal.
trans-unit.target: 判斷兩個物件執行個體是否相等。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to compare with the current <xref:System.Object>.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the objects are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果物件相等。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Evaluates the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> instances in the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref>.

The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that is invoking the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref>.
ruleExecution is a reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: ruleExecution是參考 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: The cached <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution"></xref> cannot be validated.
Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個執行個體的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: The hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 這個執行個體的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref>.
The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref>.
Gets a list of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> classes in the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref>.
A list of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> classes in the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref>.

Validates the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref> attributes and the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> classes in the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref>.

If the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet> contains errors (the `Validate` method returns `false`), then <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> contains the list of errors encountered.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet>包含錯誤 (`Validate`方法會傳回`false`)，然後<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=fullName>包含發現的錯誤清單。</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager"></xref> to manage the validation process.
A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationErrorCollection"></xref> of errors found during validation.
validation is a reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: validation是參考 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。
